cells.data:
## Purpose

This is a follow-up to PCR CM001.  The purpose of this is to see if DP\_evenskipped2_F1 and DP\_evenskipped2_R1 work in all species. 

## DNA extraction

Need to get these species from Holli:

- [x] _D. yakuba_
- [x] _D. psuedoobscura_
- [x] _D. anassae_
- [x] _D. erecta_
- [x] _D. mojavensis_
- [x] _D. willstoni_
- [x] _D. mauritana_
- [x] _D. ruganilis_

## PCR

1. _D. anassae_
2. _D. erecta_
3. _D. mauritana_
4. _D. mojavensis_
5. _D. psuedoobscura_
6. _D. ruganilis_
7. _D. willstoni_ 
8. _D. yakuba_
9. blank

## Program

Repeat Steps 2 - 4: 35X

| step | temp |  time  |
|------|------|--------|
| 1    | 95   | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95   | 15 sec |
| 3    | 58   | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72   | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72   | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4    | hold   |
